original_text: And the earth helped the woman, and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed up the flood which the dragon cast out of his mouth.
korean_text: 땅이 여자를 도와 그 입을 벌려 용의 입에서 토한 강물을 삼키니

sentences.original_text: And the earth helped the woman
and the earth opened her mouth
which the dragon cast out of his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 용이 자기 입에서 내뱉은 홍수였습니다
